name: Roasted-Squash Bisque
keywords: appetizer, butternut squash, chicken broth, milk, orange, rosemary, tomato, fall

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 400 degrees. Roast tomatoes for 25 to 30 minutes, until they begin to collapse. Combine compote, broth and milk and bring to a boil in a medium saucepan. Lower the heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Pass through the fine disk of a food mill. Season with salt.
